divs: Sighting DetailsSitting at campground friends walked back to their camper and called us to look up towards the east skyline. Waves of traveling lights unlike planes were moving in formation at a constant speed heading west. There were at times clusters of these lights traveling together. The just keep coming from the east. (If you look at a YouTube video called freaky lights huntersville nc they seemed To capture on video what we saw however at a different date) One light object glowed more brilliantly than the three it was clustered with and then glowed so intensely it started to "melt" like lava and the part that poured down created a secondary light that descended towards earth . It was the only one that I saw do that. What were these lights. I called 911 and then channel Fox News tv. Looking for an answer. Did anyone else see this besides the four of us?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Banner Elk
There were no other sightings in Banner Elk on or around August 24th 2013
Summary: Wave of orange lights in groups traveling in sky approx over 100 over an hour
